thread.title: The Secrets of College Football’s Best Teams

author: Andrew Beaton
title: The Secrets of College Football’s Best Teams
text:
They are classified as trade secrets. They are protected by intellectual property laws. And they are valuable enough that public institutions take pains to shield them.
The documents they don’t want you to see: football game plans.
If a playbook is a team’s arsenal, then a game plan is the battle strategy. Which is why The Wall Street Journal... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
